original: “Yāvakīvañca, ānanda, vajjīnaṁ arahantesu dhammikā rakkhāvaraṇagutti susaṁvihitā
analyzed: ānanda arahantesu dhammikā rakkhā āvaraṇa gutti su sa vihitā
corrected: Yāva kīvañca ānanda vajjīnaṁ arahantesu dhammikā rakkhā āvaraṇa gutti su sa vihitā

original: Yāvakīvañca, brāhmaṇa, ime satta aparihāniyā dhammā vajjīsu ṭhassanti, imesu ca sattasu
analyzed: brāhmaṇa ime satta aparihāniyāḥ dhammāḥ vajjīsu imesu ca sattasu
corrected: Yāvakīvañca brāhmaṇa ime satta aparihāniyāḥ dhammāḥ vajjīsu ṭhassanti imesu ca sattasu

original: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ.
analyzed: eva bhante iti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato
corrected: evaṁ bhante iti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ

original: Yāvakīvañca, bhikkhave, ime satta aparihāniyā dhammā bhikkhūsu ṭhassanti, imesu ca
analyzed: bhikkhave ime satta aparihāniyāḥ dhammāḥ bhikkhūsu imesu ca
corrected: Yāvakīvañca bhikkhave ime satta aparihāniyāḥ dhammāḥ bhikkhūsu ṭhassanti imesu ca

analyzed: eva bhante iti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato
corrected: evaṁ bhante iti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ

original: “sabbasantharisanthataṁ, bhante, āvasathāgāraṁ, āsanāni paññattāni, udakamaṇiko patiṭṭhāpito, telapadīpo āropito;
analyzed: bhante āvasatha āgāre āsanāni paññattāni udaka maṇikaḥ patiṭṭhāpito tela padīpaḥ āropito
corrected: sabba santhari santhataṁ bhante āvasatha āgāraṁ āsanāni paññattāni udaka maṇiko patiṭṭhāpito tela padīpo āropito

original: “yesaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhūnaṁ devā tāvatiṁsā adiṭṭhapubbā, oloketha, bhikkhave, licchaviparisaṁ;
analyzed: bhikkhave bhikkhūnam devā tāvatisāḥ a diṭṭha pubbāḥ oloketha bhikkhave
corrected: yesaṁ bhikkhave bhikkhūnaṁ devā tāvatiṁsā adiṭṭhapubbā oloketha bhikkhave licchaviparisaṁ

original: Natthānanda, tathāgatassa dhammesu ācariyamuṭṭhi.
analyzed: nattha ānanda tathāgatassa dhammesu
corrected: nattha ānanda tathāgatassa dhammesu ācariyamuṭṭhi

original: Ossaṭṭhe ca bhagavatā āyusaṅkhāre mahābhūmicālo ahosi bhiṁsanako salomahaṁso, devadundubhiyo ca phaliṁsu.
analyzed: ossaṭṭhe ca bhagavatā āyu saṅkhāre mahā bhūmicālaḥ ahosi bhisa nako ca
corrected: ossaṭṭhe ca bhagavatā āyu saṅkhāre mahā bhūmicālaḥ ahosi bhisa nako salomahaṁso devadundubhiyo ca phaliṁsu

original: sumahā vatāyaṁ bhūmicālo bhiṁsanako salomahaṁso; devadundubhiyo ca phaliṁsu.
analyzed: su mahāḥ vata ayam bhūmicālaḥ bhisanakaḥ ca
corrected: su mahā vata ayaṁ bhūmicālo bhiṁsanako salomahaṁso devadundubhiyo ca phaliṁsu

original: sumahā vatāyaṁ, bhante, bhūmicālo bhiṁsanako salomahaṁso; devadundubhiyo ca phaliṁsu.
analyzed: su mahā vatāya bhante bhūmicālaḥ ca
corrected: su mahā vatāyaṁ bhante bhūmicālo bhiṁsanako salomahaṁso devadundubhiyo ca phaliṁsu

original: “Tasmātihānanda, tuyhevetaṁ dukkaṭaṁ, tuyhevetaṁ aparaddhaṁ, yaṁ tvaṁ tathāgatena
analyzed: tasmāt ati ha ānanda tuyhā iva etam dukkaṭa tuyhā iva etam aparaddha yam tvam tathāgatena
corrected: tasmāt iha ānanda tuyha eva etam dukkaṭam tuyha eva etam aparaddham yam tvam tathāgatena

original: Tasmātihānanda, tuyhevetaṁ dukkaṭaṁ, tuyhevetaṁ aparaddhaṁ.
analyzed: tasmāt atiha ānanda tuyhā iva etam dukkaṭa tuyhā iva etam aparaddha
corrected: tasmāti ha ānanda tuyha eva etaṁ dukkaṭaṁ tuyha eva etaṁ aparaddhaṁ

original: Tatrāpi kho tāhaṁ, ānanda, āmantesiṁ:
analyzed: tatra api khalu tāha ānandaḥ āmantesi
corrected: tatra api kho tāhaṁ ānanda āmantesiṁ

analyzed: tasmāt atiha ānanda tuyhā iva etam dukkaṭa tuyhā iva etam aparaddha
corrected: tasmāti ha ānanda tuyha eva etaṁ dukkaṭaṁ tuyha eva etaṁ aparaddhaṁ

original: tattheva rājagahe viharāmi vebhārapasse sattapaṇṇiguhāyaṁ …
analyzed: tattha iva rājagahe viharāmi vebhāra passe
corrected: tattha eva rājagahe viharāmi vebhāra passe sattapaṇṇi guhāyaṁ

analyzed: eva bhante iti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato
corrected: evaṁ bhante iti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ

original: ‘addhā idaṁ na ceva tassa bhagavato vacanaṁ;
analyzed: addhā idam na ca iva tassa bhagavataḥ
corrected: addhā idam na ca eva tassa bhagavato vacanaṁ

analyzed: addhā idam na ca iva tassa bhagavataḥ
corrected: addhā idam na ca eva tassa bhagavato vacanaṁ

analyzed: addhā idam na ca iva tassa bhagavataḥ

original: “yaṁ te, cunda, sūkaramaddavaṁ paṭiyattaṁ, tena maṁ parivisa.
analyzed: yam te cunda sūkara maddavam tena mama parivisa
corrected: yam te cunda sūkara maddavam paṭiyattam tena mam parivisa

original: “iṅgha me tvaṁ, ānanda, pānīyaṁ āhara, pipāsitosmi, ānanda, pivissāmī”ti.
analyzed: me tvam ānanda pānīyam āhara pipāsitaḥ asmi ānanda pivissāmi iti
corrected: iṅgha me tvam ānanda pānīyam āhara pipāsitaḥ asmi ānanda pivissāmi iti

corrected: iṅgha me tvam ānanda pānīyam āhara pipāsitaḥ asmi ānanda pivissāmi iti

analyzed: me bhaṇe siṅgī vaṇṇam yuga maṭṭham dhāraṇīyam āharāti
corrected: iṅgha me tvaṁ bhaṇe siṅgī vaṇṇam yuga maṭṭham dhāraṇīyam āharāti

original: ‘aniccā saṅkhārā, taṁ kutettha labbhā’”ti.
analyzed: aniccā saṅkhārā tam kuta ittha
corrected: aniccā saṅkhārā taṁ kutettha labbhā ti

original: Tatra ce rājā cakkavattī bhāsati, bhāsitenapi sā attamanā hoti.
analyzed: tatra ce rājā cakkavattī bhāsati sā atta manāḥ
corrected: tatra ce rājā cakkavattī bhāsati bhāsitena api sā atta manā hoti

analyzed: tatra ce rājā cakkavattī bhāsati sā atta manāḥ
corrected: tatra ce rājā cakkavattī bhāsati bhāsitena api sā atta manā hoti

original: Santi, bhante, aññāni mahānagarāni, seyyathidaṁ—
analyzed: santi bhante aññāni mahā nagarāni
corrected: santi bhante aññāni mahā nagarāni seyyathidaṁ

original: nacirasseva—yassatthāya kulaputtā sammadeva agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajanti—tadanuttaraṁ
analyzed: kula puttā sammat eva agārasmai anagāriyam pabbajanti tat anuttara
corrected: nacirasseva yassa atthāya kula puttā sammat eva agārasmai anagāriyam pabbajanti tat anuttaram

original: “Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā”ti abbhaññāsi.
analyzed: vusitam brahmacariya katam karaṇīya na aparam itthattāya ati
corrected: Khīṇā jāti vusitam brahmacariyam katam karaṇīyam na aparam itthattāya ti abbhaññāsi

original: ‘atītasatthukaṁ pāvacanaṁ, natthi no satthā’ti.
analyzed: atīta satthukam natthi no satthā ati
corrected: atīta satthukam pāvacanam natthi no satthā ati

original: Atha kho bhagavā saññāvedayitanirodhasamāpattiyā vuṭṭhahitvā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā saññā vedayita nirodha samāpattiyā vuṭṭhahitvā
corrected: atha kho bhagavā saññā vedayita nirodha samāpattiyā vuṭṭhahitvā neva saññā nāsaññāyatanaṁ

original: “aniccā saṅkhārā, taṁ kutettha labbhā”ti.
analyzed: aniccā saṅkhārā tam kuta ittha
corrected: aniccā saṅkhārā taṁ kutettha labbhā ti

original: ‘aniccā saṅkhārā, taṁ kutettha labbhā’”ti.
analyzed: aniccā saṅkhārā tam kuta ittha
corrected: aniccā saṅkhārā taṁ kutettha labbhā ti

original: “aniccā saṅkhārā, taṁ kutettha labbhā”ti.
analyzed: aniccā saṅkhārā tam kuta ittha
corrected: aniccā saṅkhārā taṁ kutettha labbhā ti

original: Tesañca pañcannaṁ dussayugasatānaṁ dveva dussāni na ḍayhiṁsu yañca sabbaabbhantarimaṁ yañca bāhiraṁ.
analyzed: tesam ca pañcannam dussa yuga satānam dve iva dussāni na yat ca yat ca
corrected: tesam ca pañcannam dussa yuga satānam dve eva dussāni na dayhimsu yat ca sabba abbhantarimam yat ca bahiram

original: Vesālikāpi licchavī vesāliyaṁ bhagavato sarīrānaṁ thūpañca mahañca akaṁsu.
analyzed: vesālikā api licchavī vesāliyam bhagavato
corrected: vesālikā api licchavī vesāliyam bhagavato sarīrānam thūpañ ca mahañ ca akamsu

original: Kapilavatthuvāsīpi sakyā kapilavatthusmiṁ bhagavato sarīrānaṁ thūpañca mahañca akaṁsu.
analyzed: sakyā kapilavatthusmin bhagavato sarīrānam
corrected: Kapilavatthuvāsīpi sakyā kapilavatthusmin bhagavato sarīrānam thūpañca mahañca akaṁsu

original: Allakappakāpi bulayo allakappe bhagavato sarīrānaṁ thūpañca mahañca akaṁsu.
analyzed: bulayaḥ allakappe bhagavato sarīrānam thūpam maham ca
corrected: Allakappakā pi bulayaḥ allakappe bhagavato sarīrānam thūpam ca maham ca akamsu

original: Rāmagāmakāpi koḷiyā rāmagāme bhagavato sarīrānaṁ thūpañca mahañca akaṁsu.
analyzed: koḷiyā rāmagāme bhagavato sarīrānam
corrected: Rāmagāmakāpi koḷiyā rāmagāme bhagavato sarīrānaṁ thūpañca mahañca akaṁsu

original: Pippalivaniyāpi moriyā pippalivane aṅgārānaṁ thūpañca mahañca akaṁsu.
analyzed: pippalivaniyā api moriyā pippalivane thūpam ca
corrected: pippalivaniyā api moriyā pippalivane aṅgārānaṁ thūpam ca maham ca akaṁsu
